name: Dokomademo Aoku...
overview: Dokomademo Aoku is an adventure game that is a version of the pc game published in 2000 by Topcat. The player takes the role of a young boy that returns to his hometown after a year out, there he finds that his old school is going to close and he meets his 5 childhood friends, it seems that some strange things are happening in the village (there is one person trying to make money out of the old village and other more strange things) so maybe he will have to find out what happens. During the time there he will go with his friends around the town and outside in some travels, and maybe during the game he will find a girl that will love him (from one of his 5 friends). The gameplay is about choosing about different answers to let the story advance in a way or another, the game features japanese voice acting for the characters and different endings depending of the player choices during the game.
